蜯字的基本解释

蜯
bàng
同“蚌”。

蜯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bàng］
［《廣韻》步項切，上講，並。］
亦作“硥1”。亦作“蜯1”。
(1)软体动物。有两个可以开闭的多呈椭圆形介壳，壳内有珍珠层，或能产珠。
(2)蠧虫。
[②]［bèng］
地名用字。今安徽省有蚌埠市。
[③]［fēng］
［《集韻》敷容切，平鍾，敷。］
通“蜂1”。

蜯字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蜯； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1087第12
【集韻】歩項切，音棒。【玉篇】與蚌同。【說文】一曰美珠。【班固·答賔戲】隋侯之珠，藏於蜯蛤。【干祿字書】蚌俗字。

蜯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蜯字的起名意思

暂无。

Squint
Basic explanation of words
Squint
bàng
Same as "clam".
Squint
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bàng］
["Guangyun" step-by-step, last talk, and. ]
Also known as "硥1". Also known as "Squint 1".
(1) Mollusks. There are two open and closed shells, mostly oval-shaped shells, with nacreous layers in them, or capable of producing beads.
(2) Midges.
[②]［bèng］
Place names in words. Today, there is Bengbu City in Anhui Province.
[③] [fēng]
["Jiyun" apply Rongqie, Pingzhong, apply. ]
Pass "Bee 1".
Squint
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蜯; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1087 Page 12
【Ji Yun】Walking item cut, sound bar. 【Jade articles】Same as mussels. [Said Wen] One said Meizhu. [Bangu·An Biao Opera] The Pearl of Sui Hou, hidden in the clam. 【Book of Dry Lu Characters】Clam custom characters.
